edu.cwru.sepia.util

Class DeepEquatableUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cwru.sepia.util.DeepEquatableUtil

  • public class DeepEquatableUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Some utility methods to use DeepEquals on Collections, as well as null-checking on both.
    Author:
    The Condor

      • deepEqualsListList

        public static boolean deepEqualsListList(java.util.List<? extends java.util.List<? extends DeepEquatable>> obj1,
                         java.util.List<? extends java.util.List<? extends DeepEquatable>> obj2)
        A method to compare the deep equality of two Lists of Lists.
        Suffixed by ListList due to type erasure, which makes generics not overload intuitively.
        Parameters:
        obj1 -
        obj2 -
        Returns:
        True if both arguments are null or if both are non-null, of the same size, and objects with the same indices are deepEquals to eachother. False otherwise.
